title: [Epidemiology] Those who recover from COVID-19 are protected against the virus for at least six months, and likely much longer. Antibodies produced months after the infection showed increased ability to block SARS-CoV-2, as well as its mutated versions such as the South African variant.

[Epidemiology] COVID-19 is dangerous not only for the elderly but for middle-aged adults, according to a new study. The odds that an infection becomes fatal is only 1:10,000 at age 25, whereas those odds are roughly 1:100 at age 60, 1:40 at age 70, and 1:10 at age 80."
